title: Bonus: Stitcher Premium Episode
description: In a free bonus episode of Full Release for Stitcher Premium, Sam answers listener questions about interviewing people who don't like her (wow, rude!), being a boss-ass-bitch, and her very specific surprising pet peeve about journalists.
author: fullrelease@sambee.com (Samantha Bee & Earwolf)
